Feats: Alert; Dungeon Delver; Healer; Magic Initiate (Wizard); Savage Attacker Ranger Features: Archery Style; Armor Proficiency (Medium/Shield); Beast Master Archetype; Bestial Fury; Colossus Slayer; Defense Style; Dueling Style; Escape The Horde; Evasion; Exceptional Training; Extra Attack; Favored Enemy; Feral Senses; Foe Slayer; Giant Killer; Hide In Plain Sight; Horde Breaker; Hunter Archetype; Land's Stride; Multiattack Defense; Natural Explorer; Primeval Awareness; Ranger's Companion; Save Proficiency (Dexterity/Strength); Share Spells; Skill Proficiency (Choose 3 from Animal Handling, Athletics, Insight, Investigation, Nature, Perception, Stealth, Survival); Spellcasting; Stand Against The Tide; Steel Will; Two-Weapon Fighting Style; Uncanny Dodge; Vanish; Volley; Weapon Proficiency (Martial); Whirlwind Attack Human Features: Human Ability Adjustment Acolyte Features: Languages (Choose 2 from any); Shelter Of The Faithful; Skill Proficiency (Insight/Religion)
Feature Notes:
Bestial Fury: Companion 2 attacks/rd
Exceptional Training: Companion can Dash, Disengage, Help instead of attack
Healer: Stabilize via healer's kit restores 1 HP, healer's kit heals 1d6+4+target HD HP 1/short rest
Ranger's Companion: Companion beast obeys commands
Share Spells: R30' Self spell affects companion
Shelter Of The Faithful: Receive aid from associated temple
Skill Proficiency: Athletics; Insight; Perception; Religion; Stealth
Skills:
Acrobatics: (dex) 1 Insight: (wis) 9 Performance: (cha) 2
Animal Handling: (wis) 3 Intimidation: (cha) 2 Persuasion: (cha) 2
Arcana: (int) 1 Investigation: (int) 1 Religion: (int) 7
Athletics: (str) 7 Medicine: (wis) 3 Sleight Of Hand: (dex) 1
Deception: (cha) 2 Nature: (int) 1 Stealth: (dex) 7
History: (int) 1 Perception: (wis) 9 Survival: (wis) 3
Languages: Celestial; Common; Infernal; Orc
Skill Notes:
Dungeon Delver: Adv detect secret doors, normal passive Perception at full speed
Favored Enemy: Adv Survival to track and info about 3 creature types, learn enemy language
Feral Senses: 30' awareness of invisible creatures
Hide In Plain Sight: +10 Dex (Stealth) to hide w/prepared camouflage
Natural Explorer: Dbl Int and Wis Prof, normal move in difficult terrain, always alert, full speed solo stealth, locate dbl food, extra track info for 3 terrains
Vanish: Hide as bonus action, untrackable non-magically
Combat
Hit Points: 161 Initiative: 6 Armor Class: 14 Attacks Per Round: 2
Armor Proficiency: Medium; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Martial
Armor: Studded Leather Shield: None Weapons: Greataxe: 1 (+7 1d12+1); Mace: 1 (+7 1d6+1); Shortsword: 1 (+7 1d6+1); Unarmed: 1 (+7 1d1+1)
Combat Notes:
Alert: +5 Initiative/foes no surprise or unseen Adv
Archery Style: +2 ranged attack
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Defense Style: +1 AC in armor
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +1
Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Damage Adjustment: +1
Colossus Slayer: +1d8 HP vs. damaged foe 1/turn
Dueling Style: +2 damage with single, one-hand weapon
Escape The Horde: Foe Disadv on OA
Feral Senses: No Disadv vs. invisible foe
Foe Slayer: +3 attack or damage vs. favored enemy
Giant Killer: React to attack adjacent lg foe after miss
Horde Breaker: Second attack on different adjacent foe
Multiattack Defense: +4 AC on additional foe attacks after hit
Savage Attacker: Re-roll damage 1/turn
Stand Against The Tide: Redirect foe miss to another creature
Two-Weapon Fighting Style: Add ability modifier to second attack damage
Uncanny Dodge: Use reaction for half damage
Volley: Ranged attack any number of foes in 10' radius
Whirlwind Attack: Melee attack any number of adjacent foes
Save Proficiency: Dexterity; Strength

Save Notes:
Dungeon Delver: Adv vs. traps, resistance trap damage
Evasion: Dex save yields no damage instead of half
Land's Stride: Adv vs. impeding plants
Steel Will: Adv vs. fright

Friends (W0 Ench): Self Adv Cha w/target for conc/1 min

Jump (R1 Tran): Touched jump x3 for 1 min
Minor Illusion (W0 Illu): R30' Sound of 1 creature or 5' cu image (Investigation disbelieve) for 1 min

Plant Growth (R3 Tran): R150' Enrich half mi radius for 1 yr or overgrow 100' radius
